name: One minute of death
description:
"One minute of death" is a platform game in which you have to survive a minute in a level.

Features:
*45 unique levels.
*Three levels of difficulty.
*Random level generator with settings.
*Speedrun mode.
*CRT effect (you can turn it off).
*Statistics.
*Retro style.
*Created by one person.

WARNING !
Game is challenging and addictive.
